get.description: Returns all assignments from the database.

post.description: Takes an assignment JSON and stores in DB. Returns saved JSON.

get.description: Returns the assignment whose ID value matches the id.

put.description: Updates and returns a single assignment whose ID value matches the id.

delete.description: Deletes a single assignment from the repository based on id.

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Returns all course materials from the database.

post.description: Takes a course material JSON and stores in DB. Returns saved JSON.

get.description: Returns the course material whose ID value matches the id.
get.summary: Get single course material by id

put.description: Updates and returns a single course material whose ID value matches the id.
put.summary: Update single course material by id

delete.description: Deletes a single course material from the repository based on id.
delete.summary: Remove single course material by id

delete.description: Deletes a single course from the repository based on id.

delete.description: Deletes a single document from the repository based on id.

get.description: Lấy tệp từ bucket 'media' của MinIO hoặc trả về URL đã ký trước để truy cập tệp. Yêu cầu tên object của tệp.

parameters.description: Tên object của tệp (bao gồm thư mục, ví dụ: images/example.jpg)
parameters.name: objectName

get.description: Use this for liveness probes or any other checks which only validate if the services is running.
get.summary: Health is used to handle HTTP Health requests to this service.

get.description: Returns all notifications from the database.

post.description: Takes a notification JSON and stores in DB. Returns saved JSON.

get.description: Returns the notification whose ID value matches the id.

put.description: Updates and returns a single notification whose ID value matches the id.

delete.description: Deletes a single notification from the repository based on id.

get.description: Returns all submissions from the database.

post.description: Takes a submission JSON and stores in DB. Returns saved JSON.

get.description: Returns the submission whose ID value matches the id.

put.description: Updates and returns a single submission whose ID value matches the id.

delete.description: Deletes a single submission from the repository based on id.

post.description: Tải file lên bucket 'media' của MinIO. Định dạng hỗ trợ: JPG, PNG, MP4, PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX.

400.description: File hoặc yêu cầu không hợp lệ

get.description: Returns all users from the database.

post.description: Takes a user JSON and stores in DB. Returns saved JSON.

get.description: Returns the user whose ID value matches the id.

put.description: Updates and returns a single user whose ID value matches the id. New data must be passed in the body.

delete.description: Deletes a single user from the repository based on id.

cover_image_document_id.description: ID ảnh bìa (tham chiếu đến Document, có thể null)

description.description: Mô tả chi tiết (có thể null)

teacher_id.description: ID của giáo viên (tham chiếu đến User)

updated_at.description: Thời gian cập nhật gần nhất

password.description: Changed from password_hash since this is raw password

uploader_id.description: ID người đã tải file lên (tham chiếu đến User)

date_of_birth.description: Sử dụng time.Time cho DATE có thể NULL

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer <token>
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
